transliteration.en: yau keh kai bateeyaa bal so barachhaa dhuj sa(n)jut khai(n)ch chalaayo ||

transliteration.english: augr paraakram kai sa(n)g baan achaanak so kaT bhoom giraayo ||
transliteration.hindi: उग्र पराक्रम कै संग बान अचानक सो कटि भूमि गिरायो ॥
